items.solution_html: The correct leaf is the eighth from the right. Note that darker blue indicates higher probability of red, and darker orange indicates higher probability of white. In the terminal node, there are 3617 instances of white and 30 instances of red. Hence the estimated probability is 30/(30+3617) = 0.008.
